en.unsynthesizableFood: You don’t know how to synthesize this kind of food…
en.aminoAcidSynthesis_description: Amino Acid synthesis (a blue dot) description
en.complexNutrientSynthesis_description: Complex nutrient synthesis (a red dot) description
en.S1_StartsToMoveAround: It seems that you are hungry. Let’s try to get some food.
en.S1_FirstDotOfFood: It seems you are a little slow… We are lucky there is not so much competition around.
en.S2_ReproduceWindow_0: Now it’s time to reproduce yourself. Some mutations may occur in the process and your offspring may keep them. This process takes place as part of a random mutation process, but today we can play with it a little.
en.S2_ReproduceWindow_1: Let’s choose some structural adaptations for our lifeform. We need to move a little faster, don’t you think?
en.S2_StartsToMoveAround: Oh! Some mutations make a big improvement in the populations. Moving faster gives the offspring more chances of surviving.
en.S2_MoveAroundAgain: There’s a lot of food… but not enough for everyone. Hurry up!
en.S3_ReproduceWindow_0: Now you have to choose. Maybe you want your life forms to be acid resistant or capable of synthesizing new forms of nutrients.
en.S3_ReproduceWindow_1: Remember: new mutations may be part of the offspring's heir.
en.S3_UnadaptedOffpring: The offspring that do not adapt their defenses can’t survive to the new challenges of the environment.
en.S3_EatsNewNutrients: Now you are able to synthesize new nutrients. It means you can evolve faster than your previous heritage.
en.S3_EnemyOnScreen: Some hostile lifeforms also explore around this place, looking for food. Be careful. Move fast or find a place to hide: you don’t want to be in their way.
en.S4_ReproduceWindow_0: Now it’s time to add the other adaptation to the list of your traits. At least, every advantage is important when you need to survive.
en.S5_ReproduceWindow_0: The behavior of your population is a form of adaptation too. Maybe you can confront some hostile entities out there with the correct choice.
en.EOG_Congratulations: Congratulations! Your population got adapted to the environment through generations and survived effectively. This process doesn’t have an end… the evolution continues as long as the population survives.
en.FoodIstaken: There is not enough food for you to fill your DNA bar… let’s try again.
en.TryToPassAcid: Acid dissolves your cells… maybe you should need more protection before trying going there again.
en.AproachUneatableFood: You don’t know how to synthesize this kind of food…
en.CollisionWithEnemy: Hostile lifeforms are a treat to your population survival. Be careful next time. Choose your adaptations wise.
en.EnemyCanBeDeactivated: Entities which are smaller than you, or even the same size, can be confronted. You can try getting closer and see!
en.BiggerHostileEnemyTouchsPlayer: It’s true you can defend yourself now… but be realistic!
